name: AI Visibility Marketing Ontology v2.0
description: Comprehensive ontology for AI Visibility strategic marketing framework, integrating AI discoverability as foundational capability within CMO role and marketing strategy cascade. Extends schema.org with AI-era marketing concepts.
purpose: Enable systematic planning, execution, and measurement of AI Visibility strategies that ensure organizational discoverability in AI-mediated search and recommendation systems

schemaOrgAlignment.rationale: Grounds in schema.org for semantic interoperability while extending for AI Visibility domain

entities.name: AI Visibility Strategy
entities.description: Strategic capability ensuring an organization's brand, products, expertise, and content are discoverable, understandable, and recommendable by AI systems (LLMs, agents, AI search engines)

properties.name: Knowledge Representation
properties.description: Method of structuring organizational knowledge for AI

properties.name: Citation Network
properties.description: Web of authoritative sources linking to organization

businessRules: AI Visibility Strategy MUST have visibility score target >= 80
Strategy MUST identify at least 3 target AI systems
Strategy MUST include knowledge representation approach

entities.name: AI Visibility Objective
entities.description: Strategic objective focused on achieving AI discoverability outcomes, part of OKR framework

properties.name: Aligns With Corporate
properties.description: Corporate objective this AI Visibility objective supports

properties.name: Cascades To
properties.description: Team or functional objectives this cascades to

entities.name: Key Result
entities.description: Measurable outcome that indicates objective achievement

entities.name: Knowledge Graph
entities.description: Structured representation of organizational knowledge, entities, and relationships optimized for AI understanding

properties.name: Schema.org Coverage
properties.description: Percentage of entities using schema.org vocabulary

entities.name: AI Optimized Content
entities.description: Content asset optimized for AI system comprehension and recommendation

properties.name: AI Readability Score
properties.description: Score (0-100) indicating how well AI systems can understand content

properties.name: AI Citation Count
properties.description: Number of times cited by AI systems

properties.name: Target Queries
properties.description: AI queries this content should appear in

businessRules: AI Optimized Content MUST have aiReadabilityScore >= 85
Content MUST have structured data (hasStructuredData = true)
Content SHOULD target at least 3 specific AI queries
Content MUST be reviewed if aiCitationCount = 0 for 30 days

entities.name: Citation Source
entities.description: Authoritative source that cites or links to organization, contributing to AI visibility

properties.name: Impact on AI
properties.description: Estimated impact on AI system knowledge

entities.name: Chief Marketing Officer Role
entities.description: C-Suite role responsible for marketing strategy including AI Visibility leadership

properties.name: AI Visibility Responsibility
properties.description: Level of accountability for AI Visibility

properties.name: Collaborates With Roles
properties.description: Other C-Suite roles for AI Visibility

entities.name: Marketing Campaign
entities.description: Coordinated marketing initiative that depends on AI Visibility

properties.name: Depends on AI Visibility
properties.description: Whether campaign success requires AI discoverability

properties.name: AI Sourced Leads
properties.description: Number of leads from AI channels

entities.name: Platform Instance
entities.description: Specific implementation of AI Visibility strategy for a platform (BAIV, W4M, ECOOAI, etc.)

relationships.name: Cascades To
relationships.description: OKR cascading relationship from strategic to tactical level

relationships.name: Depends On
relationships.description: Dependency relationship showing what requires AI Visibility

relationships.name: Enables
relationships.description: Shows what AI Visibility enables downstream

relationships.name: Measures
relationships.description: Metrics that measure strategy or objective success

relationships.name: Cites
relationships.description: Citation relationship from source to organization

queryPatterns.query: What is the AI visibility strategy for [organization]?
Show how corporate OKRs cascade to AI Visibility execution
queryPatterns.expectedResponse: Traverse cascadesTo relationships from corporate goals

queryPatterns.query: What marketing activities depend on AI Visibility?
queryPatterns.expectedResponse: Query dependsOn relationships to find dependent activities

queryPatterns.query: What is the current AI visibility score and trend?
queryPatterns.expectedResponse: Retrieve metrics with category='Discovery' and trend analysis

queryPatterns.query: Compare AI visibility implementation across platforms

reasoningSupport: Identify circular dependencies in OKR cascades
Recommend optimal citation sources based on authority scores
Predict impact of content optimization on visibility score
Suggest RACI assignments based on role collaborations
Generate alerts when metrics fall below benchmarks

changeHistory.description: Complete AI Visibility integration with CMO framework, graph-based dependencies, cascading OKRs, and platform-specific implementations
Initial CMO role and marketing strategy ontology

useCases.name: Corporate Strategy to AI Visibility Cascade
useCases.description: Trace how corporate leadership objectives cascade through marketing to AI Visibility execution
useCases.scenario: CEO sets market leadership goal → CMO creates brand leadership objective → AI Visibility team defines discoverability targets → Content team executes optimization

useCases.name: Platform-Specific AI Visibility Implementation
useCases.description: Implement AI Visibility strategy customized for specific platform (BAIV, W4M, ECOOAI)
useCases.scenario: Select platform template → Customize OKRs → Deploy strategy → Measure performance

useCases.name: Cross-Functional AI Visibility Collaboration
useCases.description: Coordinate AI Visibility efforts across C-Suite and departments
useCases.scenario: CMO defines strategy → CTO implements infrastructure → CDO structures data → CAO integrates AI capabilities → All measure results

useCases.name: AI Visibility Performance Analysis
useCases.description: Analyze AI visibility metrics to identify gaps and opportunities
useCases.scenario: Collect metrics → Analyze trends → Identify gaps → Recommend optimizations → Track improvements
